about_the_game:
Square Off is a fast-paced, platforming arena. Control physics-based battle squares in speedy combat challenges and shoot your friends into oblivion while you're at it!

Destroy Your Opponents

Combat works with a knock-back multiplier system - the more you get hit, the more damage you take, the further you fly into the distance! Throw all of your foes off of the screen to win.

Become a Champion

Become the ultimate square champion by beating out your friends in every round and claim your spot at the summit of the victors podium.

Gamemodes

Partake in the classic and well loved Deathmatch Arena, based closely on the much loved system of the Smash Bros. series - or if you prefer a more enduring challenge, battle it out in the gruelling King of the Hill.

Never Ending Chaos

With a combination of crazy gamemodes, powerful item pickups, fully destructible terrain and an ever expanding collection of maps, the brutal chaos and party game fun is never ending.
